translations.en:
: ** :mag_right: As you wander around, you come across a battlefield, in the surrounding area, you notice several soldiers looking for possible survivors of a massacre.

:handshake: Offer to help
:spy: Steal bodies
:walking: Don't help them

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
